cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.1)

project(ThirdParty)

# Set the language support level
set(CMAKE_C_STANDARD 17)
set(CMAKE_CXX_STANDARD 17)

# Where intermediate builds end up
set(BUILD_INSTALL_PREFIX ${ThirdParty_SOURCE_DIR}/../../Develop/${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE})

# Build shared libraries or not?
if(NOT DEFINED BUILD_SHARED_LIBRARIES)
  set(BUILD_SHARED_LIBRARIES NO)
endif()

# Set common cmake arguments
if (DEFINED CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE)
	set(common_cmake_args "-DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE=${CMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE};-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE};-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${BUILD_INSTALL_PREFIX};-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=${BUILD_SHARED_LIBRARIES}")
else()
	set(common_cmake_args "-DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=${CMAKE_BUILD_TYPE};-DCMAKE_INSTALL_PREFIX=${BUILD_INSTALL_PREFIX};-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=${BUILD_SHARED_LIBRARIES}")
endif()

# Set up external project support
include(ExternalProject)

ExternalProject_Add(g2o
	SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/g2o/g2o-master
	BINARY_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/g2o/g2o-master
	INSTALL_DIR ${BUILD_INSTALL_PREFIX}
    CMAKE_ARGS "${common_cmake_args};-DBUILD_LGPL_SHARED_LIBS=${BUILD_SHARED_LIBRARIES};-DBUILD_WITH_MARCH_NATIVE=NO;-DG2O_BUILD_EXAMPLES=OFF;-DG2O_BUILD_SLAM2D_TYPES=OFF"
)

ExternalProject_Add(DLib
	SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/DLib/DLib-local
	BINARY_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/DLib/DLib-local
	INSTALL_DIR ${BUILD_INSTALL_PREFIX}
    CMAKE_ARGS "${common_cmake_args};-DBUILD_DUtilsCV=YES;-DBUILD_DVision=YES"
)

ExternalProject_Add(DBoW2
	SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/DBoW2/DBoW2-local
	BINARY_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/DBoW2/DBoW2-local
	INSTALL_DIR ${BUILD_INSTALL_PREFIX}
    CMAKE_ARGS "${common_cmake_args};-DBUILD_Demo=OFF"
)

ExternalProject_Add(Pangolin
	SOURCE_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Pangolin/Pangolin-master
	BINARY_DIR ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Pangolin/Pangolin-master
	INSTALL_DIR ${BUILD_INSTALL_PREFIX}
    CMAKE_ARGS "${common_cmake_args};-DBUILD_TESTS=NO;-DBUILD_TOOLS=NO;-DBUILD_EXAMPLES=NO;-DBUILD_PANGOLIN_PYTHON=NO;-DBUILD_PANGOLIN_FFMPEG=NO;-DBUILD_SHARED_LIBS=NO;-DBUILD_EXTERN_GLEW=NO;-DBUILD_EXTERN_LIBPNG=NO;-DBUILD_EXTERN_LIBJPEG=NO;-DMSVC_USE_STATIC_CRT=NO;-DBUILD_PANGOLIN_ZSTD=NO;-DBUILD_PANGOLIN_LZ4=NO;-DBUILD_PANGOLIN_LIBOPENEXR=NO")
